programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Summer desserts are all about fruit. As inviting as a bowl of sweet berries can be, there's something about baked fruit desserts that we can't resist. In this episode we take a look at two summer favorites: blueberry cobbler and free-form fruit tart.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: With its impressive mounds of tender, juicy apples and melt-in-your-mouth pastry crust, deep-dish apple pie should take your breath away. Creating a pie with such a high volume of filling does, however, pose challenges.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: There seems to be a cookie to fit any occasion or mood. In this episode we look at two from opposite ends of the style spectrum—the thick, homey oatmeal and the dainty, elegant spritz.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we aim to resurrect the traditional birthday cake. We've developed an honest-to-goodness layer cake with an old-fashioned jam filling and real butter frosting—the type of cake guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: German chocolate cake—filled with sticky pecans and coconut—is not without flaws. We set out to develop a German chocolate cake that avoids the common pitfalls and delivers on its promise.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to make a meatloaf with well-seasoned meat and just enough binder to give the loaf a tender, not tough, texture. In choosing a side dish to partner with our meatloaf, we turned to another old-fashioned dish—skillet-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Dinners prepared entirely in one skillet are perfect for weeknight cooking. Less cleanup is one obvious benefit. A skillet also gives the cook a bit more control over cooking multiple elements.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Beef, beer, and onions have a natural affinity—it's one reason burgers and onion rings are often on bar menus. In a carbonnade, the beef melds with the soft sweetness of sliced onions in a lightly thickened broth that is rich, deep, and satisfying.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted a streamlined version of roast chicken with plenty of stuffing to go around. First, we needed to solve the problem of cooking the stuffing to a safe temperature without drying out the delicate breast meat of the chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Boneless pork chops are lean and quick-cooking, making them ideal for weeknight meals. Pork tenderloin, which is also lean, has a somewhat fussy reputation, but you don't need to be a professional chef to cook tenderloin properly.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We make a fresh-tasting, quick tamale pie with a juicy, spicy mixture of meat and vegetables and a quick homemade-cornbread topping. We also show you how to cook up a really flavorful chicken stew topped with a biscuit crust.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Whether we admit it or not, there are some dishes that are a little too high in fat and calories to be enjoyed on a regular basis. Even a modest portion of macaroni and cheese or chicken Parmesan is prohibitive. But that doesn't need to be the case.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to be able to serve English-style fish and chips—large pieces of moist and delicate cod in a crisp and tender coating with thick-cut fries—at home.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Commonly found at catered events, this once-highbrow dish has become a bit of a joke. But after preparing several cookbook versions, we realized that pairing a crisp-fried coating with a delicate butter sauce was a great idea that deserved a revival.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: While the hallmark of this filet mignon is its tender texture, some argue that the beefy flavor is too mild, lacking the oomph of fattier cuts like rib eye. So we aim to boost the filet mignon's flavor with a peppercorn crust and a rich pan sauce.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We love a good stir-fry served with rice, but a noodle cake, a savory round of tender noodles sautéed in a skillet until the exterior is crisp, is also a great base for a saucy stir-fry.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We prepare a Thai-inspired beef stir-fry and share a recipe for great potstickers.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We create tasty versions of two Tex-Mex favorites: chicken fajitas and huevos rancheros.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Just when we think we've become familiar with every Italian dish under the sun, we're pleasantly surprised to come across one we've somehow overlooked—Spaghetti with Marinara Sauce.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Fifty years ago, steak Diane was prepared tableside and included a burst of pyrotechnics supplied by a match and some cognac. Sure, such theatrics might seem a bit dated and silly, but they are essential to the flavor of the dish. We explain why.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most of us might not have time to prepare eggs during the week, but come the weekend, eggs are a terrific way to begin a leisurely day. In this episode, we take a look at a couple of our favorite egg dishes—scrambled eggs and omelets.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Delicate foods, such as shrimp, are trickier to cook over the grill's intense, dry heat. We wanted to find the best way to grill shrimp so that it ends up tender, moist, and flavorful.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Summertime entertaining can often mean preparing food for groups. If you're looking for a main course to serve a crowd or want to give a new twist to a summer vegetable, we offer recipes for tender beef brisket and savory corn fritters.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we show you how the strangest-sounding methods can sometimes be the most rewarding and how a few easy tricks can give an old standby, like roast chicken, a new lift.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: If the weather is too poor for grilling and a hankering for ribs strikes, is the only choice a trip to a local barbecue joint? Or could we find the answer in the home kitchen?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Looking for a drop-dead-gorgeous summer dessert? Look no further than strawberry cream cake—a snazzier, more presentable version of strawberry shortcake.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we set out to develop ultimate versions of two favorite chocolate desserts: chocolate mousse and chocolate cupcakes.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Navaja
programme.desc: Cuando un marine es encontrado muerto, Gibbs, Fornell y el equipo se dirigen a la carretera para detener una operación ilegal de camiones.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Día de las madres
programme.desc: Los secretos surgen cuando la ex suegra de Gibbs aparece como testigo en la investigación de un asesinato.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuestas mortales
programme.desc: Un oficial es acusado de usar fuerza excesiva, lo que pone al departamento bajo escrutinio. Danny y Maria investigan el asesinato de un corredor de valores endeudado.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Se hace justicia
programme.desc: Después de la cena de Frank con el abogado mafioso Angelo Gallo, este es tiroteado y Frank escapa por poco. Mientras, Danny es llamado para servir en un jurado y termina siendo la única opinión disidente en un juicio por asesinato.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Mala sangre
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan un homicidio con el hermano de Baez como sospechoso. Frank se entera de que un oficial canino condecorado es acusado de brutalidad policial.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Error de identidad
programme.desc: Danny y Maria investigan un atentado local, pero enfrentan tensión y resistencia de la comunidad. Mientras, Frank debe lidiar con las consecuencias políticas cuando un hombre golpea a un oficial que fue demasiado agresivo en su interrogatorio.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo es cuestionado por un Comité del Senado a raíz de la pérdida de Prentiss. Mientras, una cara familiar regresa de forma inesperada para ayudar al equipo a con este caso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC es llamada a Oklahoma cuando unas mujeres están siendo asesinadas, después de ser torturadas con ácido sulfúrico.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC investiga un asesinato masivo en una empresa de seguridad de Internet en las cercanías de Charlottesville, pero las pistas revelan que no es un asesino en serie normal.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo UAC viaja a Idaho, donde un asesino en serie fija como objetivo a los sobrevivientes de la masacre de la secundaria Boise de hace 10 años.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: París
programme.desc: Cuando la testigo estrella del gobierno en un caso de malversación es objetivo de un asesino, depende del equipo ayudarla a llegar a casa con vida.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Farsa
programme.desc: El equipo se encuentra en una carrera contrarreloj cuando un grupo terrorista amenaza con detonar una bomba radioactiva en la zona de Washington.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Navaja
programme.desc: Cuando un marine es encontrado muerto, Gibbs, Fornell y el equipo se dirigen a la carretera para detener una operación ilegal de camiones.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Día de las madres
programme.desc: Los secretos surgen cuando la ex suegra de Gibbs aparece como testigo en la investigación de un asesinato.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man and woman are pulled over while out on a candy run. A simple traffic violation turns into a multi-vehicle police pursuit. Deputies are notified of a stolen car and find the driver in possession of an interesting tool.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distinctive tattoo reveals a wanted felon’s true identity. Deputies talk to a young woman who traded one bad habit for another. A man in possession of a stolen vehicle tells officers how his day went from bad to worse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man receives an enormous break due to public health concerns. Officers are doubtful when two friends claim they were unaware of each other’s actions. Police pull over a car full of people who know very little about themselves.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A car chase involves tire spikes, shredded rubber, and crashed gates. Suspects accused of burglary state they only steal to pay rent. A traffic stop proves there’s always more than meets the eye.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect tries to outrun the law by bicycle but can’t out pedal police. A deputy goes undercover to investigate stolen baseballs. A K-9 discovers hidden contraband on a suspect’s most private places.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A seatbelt violation ends in a chase to the confusion of all involved. A suspect with a history of grand theft auto is found in another stolen car. Officers find drugs in a tough part of town.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers smell the pungent odor of marijuana during a minor traffic violation. Cocaine is found on a suspect pulled over for a broken windshield. A store is robbed by someone in a red dress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man accused of burglary claims he’s hallucinating. A suspect tries to show off by parading his white pistol and causes pandemonium. A traffic stop offers an accused man a second chance.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: It’s all deputies and dogs on deck in an attempt to subdue a man in distress. A suspect proves to be too sleepy to engage in truck thievery. A baby is rescued in a car with no air conditioning.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers apprehend an individual with a saw-like knife. A man accused of auto theft claims his girlfriend allowed him to borrow her wheels. Chiquita the chihuahua helps its owner through hard times.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Stop sticks are deployed to intercept a vehicle with bullets. Two suspects watch their life unravel after being found with meth. Police assist young and restless runaways.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect can’t stop huffing butane. Mistrust proves toxic after a dispute over slot machines. A puppy proves to be the magic charm with individuals who’ve hit a rough patch.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A stolen U-Haul is seized during a felony traffic stop. An unfaithful husband is caught hiding his mistress in the bathroom. Police assist an individual who is going through self-discovery.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect forgets to drive away after breaking into a used car lot. A dispute over money ends in tire slashing. Suspects are found with narcotics and tall tales.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect fresh out of jail is found with narcotics. A motorcycle named 'Love Machine' is saved from a hot wire. A man bursts his tire in a bad place and officers come to the rescue.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies halt a burglary in progress. A truck is pulled over for stolen plates and officers question how it can start with a house key. A RV is no home for a family on the brink of falling apart.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Security guards face wild threats from a suspect who states he has a 'burner' gun. A man is bit on the head and nearly faints. A passenger throws out a suspicious bag during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man can’t handle that his van is getting repossessed. An Uncle finds his nephew has been hiding all kinds of secrets. Past lovers find their old wounds have yet to heal.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Meth and alcohol cloud the tragic accusations between husband and wife. A man learns why you should report if you recover your stolen vehicle. A woman says heroin is the only thing that can heal her.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies race against time to save a young boy who is trapped inside a house fire. An intoxicated patron demands a beer on credit and argues with a store clerk. An older woman struggles with heroin.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcycle with no license plate crashes while fleeing from Deputies. A woman driving a car with no windshield blames her ex-boyfriend. A gun is found hidden in a seat during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A stabbing victim has his throat slashed while waiting for his wife. A man is shocked to learn that his rental box truck was reported stolen. Spice is found in a nervous passenger's purse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers spot two suspects on a city bus and a prolonged standoff occurs. A wanted man's friends lie to Deputies about his whereabouts. Deputies find meth in a one-armed man's truck.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A stolen car and its occupants roll into a canal and are fished out by Deputies. A shoplifting trio is caught with stolen goods. A trip to the mechanic ends in an arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A car chase ends when a driver foot bails at a restaurant. A nervous female driver blows smoke at Deputies and refuses to exit her truck. A domestic violence suspect talks in circles when questioned.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A disgruntled man is tased, leaving his unhoused wife to fend for herself. A sovereign citizen is arrested for a stolen firearm. A man in possession of meth claims a bag belongs to his girlfriend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man caught with a stolen moped attempts to run while handcuffed. Police find a man with his pants down behind a business. A suspect found asleep in his poorly parked car complains of sciatic pain.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When the CSI team investigates the brutal murder of a family, they trace the killer to the house next door, which might belong to the "Dr. Jekyll" serial killer.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When Hodges and Wendy take a group of high school CSI Explorer Scouts on a field trip, they embellish their role in solving cases and take their assignment a little bit too far.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a student is discovered murdered at Lindsey's school, the investigation takes a sharp turn when the CSIs uncover an unlikely connection between the boy's death and atrocities of the past.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A legendary comic from the good old days of Las Vegas is set to reunite with his partner on stage for one night only, until one half of the famous duo is found dead.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A mother thought to be grieving for the loss of her family three years ago becomes a suspect in a CSI investigation.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team must investigate one of their own when Langston is accused by a former colleague of being part of the Dr. Jekyll murders, on part one of a two-part season finale.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI's lives are on the line as they close in on the elusive Dr. Jekyll, and more than one member of the team may not live to see his capture.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston fights for his life after being stabbed by psychopath Nate Haskell, while the other CSIs attend a funeral that turns deadly.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Hysteria ensues when a shark attacks a woman in the pool at a Las Vegas casino "day club," and the CSIs must determine if the killer is human or shark.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A vampire and werewolf convention is at the heart of a murder investigation in Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Sqweegel, a serial killer who is punishing local heroes that harbor hidden secrets, is on the hunt in Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman who suffers from a condition called "hoarding" becomes a murder suspect when a dead body is found buried under piles of trash and debris inside her home.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a college student ends up dead after a "Walking with Dinosaurs" show, the CSIs must determine if his death was murder or accidental.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When the CSI team discovers the shredded remains of a man, they find themselves with multiple suspects who may be responsible for his death.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando el equipo de CSI investiga el brutal asesinato de una familia, rastrean al asesino hasta la casa de al lado, que podría pertenecer al asesino en serie "Dr. Jekyll".

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Hodges y Wendy llevan a un grupo de exploradores de CSI de la escuela secundaria a una excursión, embellecen su papel en la resolución de casos y llevan su tarea un poco demasiado lejos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un estudiante es descubierto asesinado en la escuela de Lindsey, la investigación da un giro brusco cuando el equipo de CSI descubre una conexión poco probable entre la muerte del niño y atrocidades del pasado.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un cómico legendario de los viejos tiempos de Las Vegas se reunirá con su compañero en el escenario solo por una noche, hasta que uno de ellos es encontrado muerto.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una madre que se pensaba que estaba de duelo por la pérdida de su familia hace tres años se convierte en sospechosa en una investigación de CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI debe investigar a uno de los suyos cuando Langston es acusado por un antiguo colega de ser parte de los asesinatos del Dr. Jekyll. Primera parte de dos del final de temporada.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Las vidas del equipo de CSI están en juego a medida que se acercan al escurridizo Dr. Jekyll, y es posible que más de un miembro del equipo no viva para ver su captura. Segunda parte del final de temporada.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston lucha por su vida después de ser apuñalado por un psicópata, Nate Haskell, mientras que los otros CSI asisten a un funeral que se vuelve mortal.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La histeria se produce cuando un tiburón ataca a una mujer en la piscina de un casino de Las Vegas. El equipo de CSI debe determinar si el asesino es humano o tiburón.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una convención de vampiros y hombres lobo está en el corazón de una investigación del asesinato en Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Sqweegel, un asesino en serie que está castigando a los héroes locales que albergan secretos ocultos, está a la caza en Las Vegas..

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una mujer que sufre de una condición llamada "acumulación" se convierte en sospechosa de asesinato cuando se encuentra un cadáver enterrado bajo pilas de basura y escombros dentro de su casa.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un estudiante universitario termina muerto después de un espectáculo de "Caminar con dinosaurios", el equipo de CSI debe determinar si su muerte fue un asesinato o un accidente.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando el equipo de CSI descubre los restos destrozados de un hombre, se encuentran con múltiples sospechosos que pueden ser responsables de su muerte.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team race against time to find out who is trying to frame Horatio for the murder of a woman he’s been dating.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a "wives weekend" ends in murder, the CSI team is faced with three women whose separate trysts with the victim make them prime suspects

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team works in tandem with NY CSI chief Mac Taylor to apprehend a serial killer before he kills the young girl he has just taken hostage

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Ryan Wolfe is attacked and seriously injured while investigating the murder of a distraught soon-to-be ex-wife, and there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team must rely on a video game for their next clue as to where a group of young gunmen will strike next.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team is hard-pressed to find the killer of an infamous drug lord, and a member of the team is investigated for drugs by Internal Affairs.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A rapist is brutally murdered after his identity is exposed. Horatio and the CSI team are called in to investigate the murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team investigate a group of male “pickup artists” out to score when one of them unexpectedly turns up dead.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Miami’s Latin Festival shifts from Samba to somber when a crowded dance floor becomes the scene of a gang member. Horatio and the team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A bizarre murder of a South Beach club owner turns out to be a script where art is imitating life. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio’s longtime criminal nemesis Walter Resden surfaces once again, and Caine is determined to finally bring him to justice.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Alex campaigns against a sex offender who moves into her neighborhood and then becomes embroiled in controversy when the man is murdered soon thereafter.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: What begins as a case of apparent Road Rage leads the CSI team to the investigation of a stolen $4 million necklace, which is tied to a murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a white supremacist is acquitted for the murder of his wife after learning she is racially mixed, it’s up to Horatio to bring the killer down.

programme.title: CSI: Miami en español
programme.desc: En la hermosa Miami, se están usando medusas mortales como arma asesina y regresa una misteriosa mujer del pasado de Jesse.

programme.title: CSI: Miami en español
programme.desc: La investigación sobre la muerte de un trabajador del censo coloca al equipo en una persecución de autos a alta velocidad y en una explosión que amenaza la vida de dos CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami en español
programme.desc: Eric Delko regresa a Miami como testigo experto de la defensa y enfrenta a sus viejos amigos, Horatio y el equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami en español
programme.desc: Cuando la novia de Estados Unidos, Phoebe Nichols, arde en llamas durante un concierto, el equipo de CSI expone el lado oscuro del estrellato pop.

programme.desc: El extraño caso de un hombre cortado por la mitad desconcierta a Horatio y al equipo de CSI, mientras que la lesión de Natalia pone a Ryan y a ella en peligro.

programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI tienen 24 horas para descubrir si un hombre condenado a muerte es realmente culpable y Eric Delko vuelve a trabajar en el caso.

programme.title: CSI: Miami en español
programme.desc: Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI resuelven el homicidio de un hombre que fue asesinado en el espacio exterior antes de devolver su cuerpo a la hermosa Miami.

programme.desc: Horatio Caine y Delko deben viajar a la brillante y soleada Los Ángeles cuando un secreto del pasado de Jesse quizá permita que un asesino quede libre.

programme.desc: Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI desentrañan el complicado misterio de un asesinato en un lugar de trabajo cuando encuentran a una odiada recepcionista asesinada en la hermosa Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami en español
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo de Horatio Caine, Kyle, regresa de la guerra, busca la ayuda de su padre y del equipo de CSI para resolver un inquietante asesinato.

programme.desc: Las vacaciones de primavera elevan la cantidad de muertos en Miami cuando Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI se separan para resolver tres asesinatos diferentes.

programme.desc: El espíritu de una víctima no dejará a Calleigh en paz hasta que ella haga justicia por su asesinato. Debe contar con la ayuda de Horatio y el resto del equipo de CSI.

programme.desc: In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic

programme.desc: Chris cheated and impregnated Lakin's neighbor. He denies he fathered Lakin’s baby. Then, John’s back for a 3rd DNA test. Can Jade prove that he’s the father or is her record 0-3?

programme.desc: Keith is terrified that Chyna cheated and their daughter may not be his. Could Keith’s best friend be the real father? Will the DNA results quash Omar's denials about fathering Jennifer’s child?

programme.title: The Maury Show: Is My Man Sleeping With My Teen Nephew?
programme.desc: Nikki won’t marry Will until he proves he’s faithful, but what did our hidden cameras confirm? Then, teens Jessica and Sean are days away from marriage. Could Sean be cheating with her best friend?

programme.desc: Tony cheated on his wife Tiff and impregnated another woman. Now he’s denying both of their kids! Plus, more shocking tales of mad moms, denying dads and DNA drama!

programme.title: The Maury Show: Top Ten Shocking Family Feuds
programme.desc: We’re counting down the top ten most unbelievable moments of family faceoffs! Plus we’ll let you know what happened to some of these guests after they left our show and returned to their lives.

programme.title: The Maury Show: 4 Women … 4 Babies … Is He the Father?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Toni, Quintin, and his mom return to find out who fathered his son. This time they’ll wonder if Toni cheated! Jenny needs to know whether her husband Matt or his friend fathered her child! Finally, will Vivian end her 30-year search for her son?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: 22-year-old Vernetta says 55-year-old Ronnie is her son's father and lied about his age when they hooked up! Next, is Krystal sleeping with her own relatives? Could their kids not be his? Plus, Keke returns to tell Tyrone a secret!

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Charisma suspects her boyfriend Trey is sleeping with another woman…her cousin Kisha! Next, Jamie and Byron return with fresh cheating accusations about Byron! Will this on-and-off-again couple truly split when the results come out?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Deshan's sister and mother believe he's lying about Joshua Jr.'s paternity and want a paternity test to have the last word! Then, 24-year-old Melissa had a baby with 47-year-old Rob, but Rob's daughter wants DNA proof! Find out today on MAURY!

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Saundra is 58 and dating 28 –year-old Ernesto. She suspects he's cheating with her 38-year-old daughter! Then, a wedding is in danger when Shante caught her fiancé texting her niece! Did Kandi catch her fiancé Jason watching his own video?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Regina says Fernando fathered her son! Fernando's mother disagrees. His father and aunt believe Regina. Fernando can't sound off because he was killed. Krystal and Ben can't agree on their relationship status and who fathered Krystal's daughter!

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Tiara wants De'Ron to admit that he fathered her baby! He claims the proof lies in fingers: his fiancée Diamond's baby has two pinky fingers like him, but Tiara's baby doesn't! Later, did Michelle have a baby with Mitchell's brother-in-law Shane?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Tyrell wants to clear his name that he has not been sleeping with his brother's girlfriend. Plus, Archie proved to his girlfriend Crystal that he didn't cheat on her, but they're back because she has a secret to reveal!

programme.title: Rock of Love: Stroller Derby
programme.desc: But things turn ugly when the most hated girl in the house gets alone time with Bret – the fangs come out and the girls are out for blood!

programme.title: Rock of Love: A Ride on the Wild Side
programme.desc: Bret wants a girl with good manual skills so he tests their aptitude with nuts and bolts in a custom motorcycle build off.

programme.title: Flavor of Love: Fifteen Beds and a Bucket of Puke

programme.title: Flavor of Love: Rub a Dub Flav

programme.title: Flavor of Love: A Friend of Flav's is a Friend of Mine

programme.title: Flavor of Love: The Flavor of Chicken

programme.title: Flavor of Love: What Happens in Flavor Stays in Flavor
programme.desc: Flavor Flav is a good luck person. So he needs a good luck woman. To test the girls on this trait, he flies the seven remaining women to Vegas on his private jet.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: At the Battle of the Bands, Adam really hits it off with Missy, another musician.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.desc: Drew can’t wait to tie the knot with Bianca in Vegas. But the closer they get, the more he second guesses their decision. When Bianca discovers Drew’s wavering, she freaks!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When tragedy strikes at Degrassi, everyone deals with the situation in a different way. As the students struggle to cope, Simpson cancels Spirit Week.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Haunted by Degrassi's recent tragedy, Eli invites Jake and Mo to a secret party. Meanwhile, Marisol tries to reunite Jake and Katie, and Jenna forms an unexpected bond with Connor.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Worried about Eli's mental state, Clare becomes overprotective. Katie wants Jake back, but is it too late? Jenna must choose between two guys.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Drew moves out, there's a break-in at the loft, and Fiona fears for her safety. Someone from Dallas' past pays him a surprise visit. A tough assignment forces Zig to think about the mistakes he's made.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona takes drastic measures to feel safer at home, and puts herself in danger. Dallas avoids telling Alli the truth about his past. After blowing off a French assignment, Zig tries to impress the teacher,

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya lets loose at a party and posts a video online, hoping it'll change her image. The battle for the student council presidency heats up when Drew enters the race. Connor tries to play matchmaker for his friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a stressful audition, Maya tosses her cello in the trash, and decides to have more fun. The competition between Drew and Clare intensifies. Connor offers Eli some advice about love.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: School's out and summer's in! A few lucky Degrassi students are bound for a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Paris, accompanied by some fresh new faces. And then there are others playing counselor at Degrassi Day Camp.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: School's out and summer's in! A few lucky Degrassi students are bound for a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Paris, accompanied by some fresh new faces. And then there are others playing counselor at Degrassi Day Camp.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Despite her illness, Clare is determined to remain a regular girl. Alli is lonely in Paris and tries to make the best of it without her BF and Tristan tries to 'bro' up while rooming with the guys.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare receives crushing news while waiting for her MRI results. Needing time away from the hospital, Clare convinces Drew to help her escape.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Why is Becky blowing Adam off to spend time with Todd? Who's Todd? Adam is not liking this long-distance relationship thing. Alli is falling hard for her Parisian waiter and worries maybe too hard too fast?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Adam takes Dallas' advice and tries juggling two girls at once. But he's not that kind of guy. When upset Tristan goes AWOL in Paris, Maya enlists her sworn enemy for help find him and Alli continues to try and find balance in her relationships.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Leo and Alli are getting to feel really serious. Distraught Drew needs to visit camp for comfort. Maya must show up Zoë and puts an expensive dress on her mother's credit card… nothing could possibly go wrong, right? !

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As summer comes to an end, Becky tries to understand the meaning behind an unexpected tragedy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew does his best as Degrassi President but without sleep, he's not much good. By Drew's side, Zoë becomes the first lady of Degrassi. Leo does damage control and tries to get in with Alli's friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The opportunity to write for a real-life magazine is offered to Clare but her brain after cancer is not cooperating.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare tries to concoct any excuse to save her reputation with the magazine but doesn’t want to play the cancer card.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham embarks on a mission to investigate the existence of the mythical giant squid.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham searches for clues related to the existence of the Loch Ness Monster in Scotland. He also visits Australia to learn about a giant lizard called Megalania.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham sets out in search of stories about Bigfoot, a mythical ape-like creature that has been the focus of many fiction novels, movies and documentaries over the years.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham explores the English countryside to learn about mythical big cats such as the Beast of Bodmin and Beast of Exmoor.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham investigates whether the thylacine, aka Tasmanian tiger or Tasmanian wolf, have truly gone extinct. The species lived in Australia and Tasmania.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: America was once home to such fierce predators as the giant short-faced bear and the saber-toothed tiger.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: In Australia 65,000 years ago, the first human explorers face a land populated with giant lizards, killer rhino-like creatures and deadly birds.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: The Maori struggled for survival 1,000 years ago in a New Zealand populated by giant birds.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Special effects-filled documentary beginning 49 million years ago. The world is heavily forested and birds rule the planet, preying on small mammals. Whales have not yet evolved and their ancestors walk on the land.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: A pregnant basilosaurus, an 18-metre, carnivorous whale which lives in the Tethys Sea, is forced to kill the young of a smaller whale to ensure the survival of her unborn calf.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Going back 25 million years to the time of the indricothere, which was the largest mammal ever to live on dry land, being seven metres high and weighing 15 tons! The only threat to an adult would have been the hyaenadon which was the size of a rhino.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: The beginnings of mankind can be traced back 3.2 million years to Ethiopia and the advent of Australopithecus, a type of ape which, like humans, was bipedal. These early members of the human family faced many dangers, including the sabre-toothed cat.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Revealing the exotic, oversized creatures that inhabited South America one million years ago, such as the deadly smilodon, the largest of all sabre tooth cats.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Looking at the depths of the Ice Age, following a group of mammoths who have been forced to travel south with the advent of winter. On a dangerous journey across the Alps, many become trapped in bogs or fall victim to predators.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Starting in Uruk, the `mother of all cities', in southern Iraq, Richard travels to Syria, Egypt, Anatolia and Greece, tracing the birth and development of technology and culture.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard looks at the winners and losers of the great Bronze Age collapse, and the new powers that emerged in the harder-edged Age of Iron.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard Miles explores the power and the paradox of the `Greek Thing', a blossoming in art, philosophy and science that went hand-in-hand with political discord, social injustice and endless war.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: In Richard Miles's epic story of civilisation, there have been plenty of examples of the great men of history, but none came close to the legend of Alexander of Macedon, known as `the Great'.

programme.desc: The Doctor discovers that the Daleks need Davros to break the stalemate in their war with the Movellans.

programme.desc: With her crew slowly vanishing, Briggs assumes the Doctor to be the guilty party.

programme.desc: The Cybermen are released from their silos and on the march.

programme.desc: The Cybermen who are intent on destroying Voga.

programme.desc: The Doctor and Peri visit Necros to pay their respects to Professor Stengos.

programme.desc: The Daleks and Davros are also on Necros, but what do they want?

programme.desc: An assassin plots to murder Davros.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor learns of the discovery of two alien seed pods in the Antarctic.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who

programme.desc: The Krynoid demands that the Doctor be surrendered to it.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: How will the Doctor rid Telos of Cybermen once and for all?

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Ky flees to the planet's poisonous surface, taking Jo with him; the Marshal, holding the Doctor captive, demands that he opens the message pod.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: British problem dogs including wild German Shepherds, a dog that must be muzzled by court order, and an English cocker spaniel that hates cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Problem dogs in the U.K. including two dogs that spent most of their lives in Africa, and a barking Jack Russell terrier mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar's English adventure ends with an aggressive klee kai, a collie mix that hates walks, and a hyper Labrador.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar brings discipline to four chaotic Chinese crested dogs, an over-energetic mastiff mix and two unruly miniature dachshunds.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps the lead singer of Rooney with his aggressive pit bull, while writer and producer Paul needs help with his two Boston terriers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Playboy Playmates, Miss February 2010 is having trouble with her Chichuahua, while Orange County, Miss September 2011 with her terrier pug mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps comedians Skyler Stone, Ralphie May and Paul Rodriguez get to grips with their unruly hounds.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps dogs overcome their fears including a whippet mix who is blind and deaf, a labradoodle that fears the ocean, and a cocker spaniel that fears all humans.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar meets NASCAR driver Kevin Harvick to help with his snappy Chihuahua and an aggressive Pekingese called Gizmo.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps fitness guru Jillian Michaels with her aggressive Chihuahua, while "Frasier" star Kelsey Grammer needs help house-training his dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Holly, a Labrador puppy, displays severe food aggression; a women's shelter will take a needy woman and her pit bull, Tucker, but Cesar must help the dog become less protective first.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Chihuahua is a pint-sized peril to its owner's roommate; slobbering Great Dane afraid of shiny floors.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A charmer around people, Opie becomes aggressive around other dogs; Flirt the Chinese Crested is hyper and neurotic.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive lab-mastiff mix; a Jack Russell mix that barks obsessively; a woman is concerned at her dog's habit of barking and growling at people.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Pekingese who refuses to eat or drink; a Chihuahua who bites people; two chow mixes who share a home but won't play nice with each other.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog kick-starts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere, and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail, leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday, but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday, but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth calls a client, Daphne, whose bond they have to revoke and makes a shocking discovery: Daphne's cosigner on her bond and ex-boyfriend, Bobby, has just committed suicide.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community, where good information won't come easy.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids, and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit of this case takes them into some parts of Oahu, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today the crew is hunting for Holly, a car thief. She's one of Tim's bonds, and the entire Dog crew knows that means trouble--or at least a long and difficult chase.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is tracking down Cecilia, who's wanted for car theft, but she's nowhere to be found. Her girlfriend and co-signer has gone missing too. Just when the trail goes cold, a friend leads the team to the cosigner's empty apartment.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado, and they face a special challenge--getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team are back in Colorado hunting bounties. Today's fugitive has a long rap sheet and a reputation for packing heat. With nothing but an address and phone number, the team heads out on the hunt.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court, and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow, Dog turns to the fugitive's on again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake visits Dominique at La Mirage to discuss her recent revelation. She tells Blake that her mother was a long-time mistress of his father and has evidence to prove it. At Alexis' trial, a neighbor offers powerful evidence that incriminates Alexis.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: On the witness stand, Steven testified he saw Alexis push Mark to his death. Jeff sees other women in an attempt to forget Fallon but remains obsessed with his ex-wife. Alexis takes the stand and testifies.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Adam and Dex vow to prove Alexis' innocence and begin a determined campaign. The woman who testified she had seen Alexis on the terrace with Mark had hosted a party that evening and snapped photographs.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Amanda insists Alexis acknowledge their relationship and begs her to reveal her father's identity. Alexis tells her it was simply an anonymous ski instructor in Gstaad. Steven and Alexis reconcile.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake offers to help Amanda find her father. Claudia goes out with Dean to dinner, while Steven rejects Luke. Jeff ends up sleeping with Nicole. Dominique goes to Istanbul to meet with Rashid Ahmed.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle goes into premature labor and delivers a baby girl, who suffers from respiratory problems. She names the child Kristina after a friend who once saved her life. Claudia is uneasy when Steven accompanies Luke on a business trip.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Upon learning that he may be Amanda's father, Blake resolves to ask Amanda to take a blood test. Nicole tells Jeff there's a chance Peter DeVilbis may have been with another woman at the time of the crash.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake buys back his racehorse Allegre from owner Daniel Reece, who sends Krystle a gift. Furious, she demands to know how he dared approach her after what happened with her sister, Iris. Amanda learns she is Blake's daughter.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle reconciles with Daniel, who reveals that his break-up with her sister was amicable. Claudia moves into La Mirage. Krystle confides to Steven that Daniel is Sammy Jo's father and therefore little Danny's grandfather.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Claudia rebuffs Steven's conciliatory attempts. Tension between Dex and Amanda continues to mount. On his deathbed, Tom Carrington makes amends with Blake, and in a final dramatic gesture, has his will changed.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle begins working with Daniel. Blake is adamantly opposed and exchanges harsh words with Reece. Dex is furious with Alexis for traveling to Sumatra to see Blake's father. Alexis learns from Amanda about Dex's experience with Daniel in Vietnam.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle launches her new business with the purchase of an Arabian horse. Sexual tension between Steven and Luke mounts. Jeff and Nikki return from Bolivia with the news of their marriage and they move into the mansion.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake returns triumphant from his negotiations with the Chinese. Alexis vows to buy into the venture. Krystle, uncomfortable with Daniel's increasing attention, avoids him. Blake invites Amanda to accompany him on a business trip to Acapulco.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis attempts to persuade the head of the Chinese delegation to hire Colbyco. Blake is surprised to learn Lady Ashley is an Acapulco. Amanda has a romantic fling with Prince Michael of Moldavia. Krystle makes a surprise visit to Daniel.

programme.desc: The Ricardos are being interviewed for a "day-in-the-life" magazine article on happy married couples. The interviewer arrives at 7 AM just in time to encounter Lucy making breakfast in a frilly lace apron, while Ricky walks in wearing a smoking jacket.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Mertzes get a pair of new tenants. Sam and Nancy Johnson are from Texas and reportedly have inside knowledge of a certain oil stock that is about to shoot through the roof. Lucy and Ethel are excited by the prospect, but Fred and Ricky have doubts.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.desc: Hurt that no one seems to care for his home movies, Ricky declares that he will never show them another feature of his...not even the TV pilot he's creating. Jealous of his project, Lucy enables the help of the Mertzes and creates her own musical western.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy wants to be a published author after hearing about another housewife who made a fortune doing it. Ricky and the Mertzes don't like it when they discover Lucy's book plays too close a resemblance to real life including anecdotes from their own lives.

programme.desc: 15-year-old Eli Shane just a regular kid from the suburbs except for one thing: he comes from a long line of Shanes, each of whom has made the journey from the surface to protect Slugterra, and the slugs that make the underground world so special.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: After the Shane hideout is ransacked, the gang trades in one of Eli's prized slugs for new gear.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
programme.desc: Runo and Marucho discover rankings of all the Bakugan players from around the world!

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
programme.desc: Julie finds herself in a brawl with her childhood friend Billy in order to save him from Masquerade.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
programme.desc: Dan and Shun have a falling out and Shun takes off on his own to seek out and destroy Masquerade.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
programme.desc: The Brawlers are ambushed by three of Masquerade's gang.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
programme.desc: Dan, Marucho, and Runo enter into battle with Klaus, Chan, and Julio, to try to find out where Masquerade is hiding.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
programme.desc: The Brawlers have reason to suspect the webmaster by the name of Joe is spying on them.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
programme.desc: Alice befriends a young Bakugan player named Christopher.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang return home to the 99 caverns to find Gateway Cavern overrun with slugs—in Eli’s absence, the Shadow Clan have governed by putting the slugs before the people, and the result is chaos!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli and the Shane Gang take Tad under their wing, training him to blast like a pro and live by the slugslinger’s code.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor – the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Lloyd moves in and tries to make nice by helping out with chores, but he just gets in the way. Pythor has awoken the Vipoids and the Constrictaurs and an all out snake war has taken over Ninjago.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer – an ancient beast who can’t be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Cragger has been freed and wants to give out CHI to all tribes of Chima, but he has none. He employs a strange Raven alchemist to produce some fake CHI. But the fake CHI has some very unexpected side effects, and the alchemist has an agenda of his own.

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Chima is peaceful yet again. Laval and Cragger go on a joyful Speedor cruise. But the Ravens use the peace to move into Eagle Spires. The Eagles try to get rid of them, but the Ravens are very persistent. It will be up to Eris to trick them to leave.

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Laval and Cragger attempt to get all the tribes to agree on a lasting peace in Chima, but Crooler creates a strange fog that makes everyone very powerful and angry, especially Cragger.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers arrive at Castle Nocturnia hoping to find the key to defeating the Nightmare King, but the castle won't reveal its secrets easily.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers rush to crack the code to reveal Lunia's secrets while the Nightmare King presses a full-scale assault on Castle Nocturnia.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Nightmare King begins to open a rift to the Waking World while Mateo presses Oz for the truth about Lunia's battle with the Nightmare King.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: A night terror is on the hunt at the fall festival and so is the Night Hunter, who appears in the Waking World with a brand-new threat for Mateo.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The barrier to the Waking World has been torn and the Nightmare King invades Brooklyn, where the Dream Chasers must make their final stand!

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: Missing Z-Blob, Mateo tries to free him to the neglect of his dream chaser duties while the team wrestles with an incursion case and a flock of unusual ravens ignites Izzie's suspicions.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: The Mayor and Carol work late when all manner of strange events begin to happen. Extreme Sports host, Dynamo, holds a competition to see who will go on the City Mars mission.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Firefighter Buster Lloyd gets the opportunity to live out his fantasy of being a police officer. Sanitation worker, Shirley Keeper, educates local residents on how to take care of their City.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: It's the day of the big rocket launch, and the entire city has Mars/launch fever! Astronauts reach Mars orbit and prepare to launch their probes, but Tippy Doorman has other plans.

programme.title: LEGO Jurassic World
programme.desc: Owen falls prey to the toxin of a poisonous prehistoric jungle flower and believes he's a raptor!

programme.title: LEGO Jurassic World
programme.desc: Danny dons powerful dino-mech armor to dig up Cap'n No-Beard's treasure beneath Mt. Sibo, making him more than a match for our heroes ... and a mighty allosaurus that unexpectedly joins the party!

programme.title: LEGO Jurassic World
programme.desc: Hudson desperately recruits powerful help to defeat Danny once and for all ... in the form of the T-Rex!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: To Mysterium
programme.desc: Cole, Zane and Bonzle travel to Mysterium, only to fall into Dorama's trap; Arin is frustrated with his Spinjitzu training.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Fugitives From Madness
programme.desc: Zane, Bonzle and Cole meet their creator Gandalaria. Kai is appointed the third Dragon Master. The dragon masters turn into stone sculptures as the blood moon appears in the sky. The other ninja's training ends prematurely.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Secrets of the Wyldness
programme.desc: When Rontu and Egalt turn to stone, Lloyd's visions lead the ninja to Wyldness. There, the ninja seek shelter in the sorceress's warehouse. Cole and Zane fight against the administration and allow Bonzle, Sprite and Gandalaria to escape.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it …

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En una borrachera, el Abuelo y el Noruego atropellan con su coche a Santa Claus justo antes de la Navidad. Para no dejar a los niños sin regalos, el Abuelo toma el lugar del accidentado.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Don Sebas se casa en una isla tropical y todos viajan a la boda. Sin embargo, los descuidos del Abuelo hacen que casi se pierda el evento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Los del Barrio llegan a su edificio y se dan cuenta que está rodeado por un gran muro que les impide la entrada.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar les restringe el dinero al Abuelo y al Noruego ocasionando que el Noruego tenga que consumir un licor hecho en casa por Peluzín lo que lo deja ciego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego lleva a Jonathan al museo de antropología por encargo de su escuela y se da cuenta que un personaje del Calendario Azteca se parece mucho a él.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia del Barrio se va de vacaciones a Acapulco, invitados por Gaspar. Después de una gran borrachera en el Baby'O, el abuelo amanece en la casa de Acapulco Shore.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Accidentalmente, el Abuelo descubre las habilidades boxísticas de Peluzín y se dedica a explotarlas. Mientras, el Noruego se embarca en la búsqueda de un nuevo hobbie.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Camino a rentar una película, el Noruego adquiere una nueva mascota. En tanto, Peluzín tiene que mudarse de su departamento por falta de pago.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se topa con un niño de la calle con quien supuestamente mantiene un parentesco mientras que Peluzín organiza un negocio piramidal para aprovecharse de todos los del edificio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un incidente hace que Irma revalore su vida y desaparezca. Mientras el Abuelo y el Noruego tratan de encontrarla, Gaspar y Jonathan tratan de encontrarle su lugar a Olaf en la familia.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Independientemente de resultado de las elecciones norteamericanas, Donald Trump decide declarale la guerra a México y LFDB se embarca en una misión especial para derrocar al tirano Trump.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pitipú recibe una visita de su pasado el cual lleva muchos años tratando de dejar atrás, mientras que el Noruego se embarca en una búsqueda para conseguirle una madre a Olaf.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En una parodia de La Rosa de Guadalupe, el Abuelo es encarado por su familia para tratarse su adicción al sexo, mientras que Peluzín se aprovecha de Olaf para establecer un negocio ilícito en la escuela.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una hilarante parodia de A Christmas Carol, en la que al Abuelo se le aparecen fantasmas del pasado presente y futuro. Olaf es Timmy y Peluzin el fantasma.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar cansado de la ineficiencia y corrupción decide postularse como servidor público, mientras que Irma es grabada en una situación incómoda, convirtiéndose en una celebridad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pelúzín se roba un paquete de la puerta de Don Sebas, volteando a todo el edificio de cabeza, mientras Jonathan, cansado del bullying del Abuelo decide darle una lección.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: LFDB decide hacerle una intervención al Abuelo porque está mas hostil que nunca y quieren que busque tratamiento médico, mientras que Peluzín y Jonathan ayudan a Pitipú a conseguir su nacionalidad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Despúes de una ardua búsqueda el Noruego encuentra a su padre, mientras que Jonathan ayuda a Peluzín a llevar una vida de bien.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego decide recuperar a su antigua mascota tlacuache llamada Chofri, mientras que el Abuelo atraviesa por un lapso de demencia senil y depende de Gaspar salvarlo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un extraño bebé aparece en la puerta de LFDB, quien viene acarreando una ola de destrucción. Ahora la salvación del mundo depende de la Familia del Barrio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo consigue una ocupación donde se siente como pez en el agua, mientras que Peluzín entra en un proyecto experimental que le traerá muchos problemas a todos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar encuentra por fin el amor de manera inesperada mientras que el Pasita, triste por las limitaciones de su edad avanzada consigue la receta para la eterna juventud.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Frustrado por su trabajo, Gaspar busca apoyo en el Abuelo y el Noruego y termina accidentado. Mientras, gracias a la medicina experimental, Peluzín se convierte en el Dr Lambretón.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pelu el Payaso le pide a Jony que sea su nuevo ayudante e inician una gira espectacular que da muchos frutos. Mientras tanto, el Noruego descubre su afición por los tatuajes.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín adquiere una nueva mascota que revolucionará el vecindario. En tanto el Noruego y Gaspar intentan ayudar a el Lentejas a superar sus extrañas inclinaciones sexuales.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y el Noruego buscan nuevos horizontes a través de la creación de una fundación, mientras Peluzín cae en la cuenta de su soledad y sale a buscar amigos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego aprende inglés y se prepara para vivir el sueño americano. En tanto, el Abuelo llega a un reencuentro con sus ex-compañeros de colegio y descubre una verdad sepultada por el tiempo.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a corrections officer leads detectives to a women's prison where a guard was linked to an inmate Carmichael put away on drug charges.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives feel a woman is withholding information when they probe the murder of her wealthy husband and very young daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Evidence points Detectives Briscoe and Curtis in the direction of a fascist youth gathering after the brutal beating and murder of a high-school girl.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Discovery of a parolee's corpse in a car trunk sends detectives after a suspect that bounty hunters also want, dead or alive.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a girl who managed to die, unnoticed, amid the hustle and bustle of an ER's waiting room.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a police officer who was shot while on an undercover stakeout.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives link the shooting of an investigative reporter to a sensationalized murder case, closed 20 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Family secrets unravel when detectives look for motives for a college professor being thrown into the path of a subway train.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate a corporate mogul's death, caused by an overdose of a drug that enhances sexual performance.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When the murder of an audio-system installer links to the mob, McCoy's office must ensure witnesses' safety.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a promising mathematician who was involved in a turbulent relationship with a college professor.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis become entangled in the Russian mafia while investigating two murders with a speechless child as the only witness.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en sus divertidas aventuras. Desde paseos en camión hasta misterios con calcetines, zapatos apestosos, magia con helados, rugidos de dinosaurios, la hora de dormir y los superpoderes de mamá: ¡un día de diversión e imaginación!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en una emocionante aventura de aprendizaje y exploración. Desde descubrir sabores hasta dominar movimientos de karate, cada aventura está llena de risas, descubrimientos y valiosas lecciones que inspiran la curiosidad.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels en un viaje especial a través de un día lleno de exploración y aprendizaje. Desde ordenar la casa hasta recordar su infancia, cada momento trae nuevos descubrimientos.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels y aprende sobre sus amigos los animales en esta emocionante aventura que seguro les arrancará muchas sonrisas a los más pequeños.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Súbete a bordo de un viaje lleno de diversión y risas mientras Little Angel se adentra en una aventura.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en sus aventuras de juego. Desde la imitación hasta los sustos a la hora de dormir, lavarse las manos, la paciencia, la búsqueda de juguetes, las ovejas sucias y el alegre cucú, ¡es un día de risas y juegos!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en sus aventuras llenas de risas y lecciones de vida. Aprenden a tomar decisiones saludables y la alegría de ayudar.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Prepárate para acompañar a los Little Angels en un viaje de coraje y valentía, en el que aprenderán a enfrentarse a nuevos retos con una sonrisa y con confianza.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en las encantadoras melodías que inspiran dulces sueños y sonrisas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Únete a Little Angel para un día de diversión! Desde cantar con globos hasta imitar sonidos de animales, canciones infantiles, partes del cuerpo, citas con el abuelo, sueños de dinosaurios y confiar en el médico, ¡es un día de risas y aprendizaje!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Acompaña a los Little Angels en un día lleno de aventuras! Desde armar un puesto de limonadas hasta convertirse en princesas, explorar con la araña Itsy Bitsy y disfrutar de fiestas en pijama, ¡cada momento es mágico!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels en un día lleno de diversión, aprendizaje y emoción. Desde la rutina matutina hasta el recreo en la escuela, pasando por el cuidado de los hermanitos y canciones deportivas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Prepárate para un armonioso viaje con los Little Angels mientras se sumergen en el mundo de las emociones. Con una melodía pegadiza y un poco de magia, convierten las lágrimas en sonrisas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en sus tiernos viajes. Desde el amor entre hermanos hasta la perseverancia, pasando por la alegría de los cumpleaños, la diversión en el salón y la salud, ¡todo un tesoro de lecciones envueltas en amor y risas!
