programme.title: Bee Gees: Everlasting Words
programme.desc: These three brothers rose to the top of their profession. Writing all of their own hits, the harmonious family act became one of the world's best-selling artists of all time, selling over more than 220 million records worldwide.

programme.title: Beach Boys: Doin' It Again
programme.desc: To mark the group's 50th anniversary, Brian Wilson, Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston, and David Marks gathered in 2012 for an emotional reunion to record their first album of new material in 20 years and to kick off a worldwide tour.

programme.title: A to Zeppelin: The Led Zeppelin Story
programme.desc: A gripping program that reveals the colorful and controversial history of rock's heaviest band, featuring interviews with members of the Yardbirds, Bad Company, The Ramones, and Foreigner.

programme.title: The Rolling Stones: Just for the Record
programme.desc: The 60's were coming-of-age years for The Rolling Stones. From the pubs of London to the concert halls of America, the 60s watched the Stones grow from a cover band to a powerhouse of rock!

programme.title: The Rolling Stones: Just for the Record
programme.desc: The 70's were a decade of extremes for The Stones. They rose to the height of their collective creative prowess, spun downward under stardom's weight, then climbed up again.

programme.title: The Rolling Stones: Just for the Record
programme.desc: The 80's came to be the most trying decade that the Rolling Stones ever faced. As the world grew closer, the Stones drifted apart. Amidst mid-life crises and solo projects, the Stones almost broke up.

programme.title: The Rolling Stones: Just for the Record
programme.desc: It was during the 1990's that The Rolling Stones proved once and for all that rock and roll has no boundaries or age limits. They'd surge with fresh wind in their sails and new lands in their sights.

programme.title: The Rolling Stones: Just for the Record
programme.desc: From Swinging London to the new millennium, The Rolling Stones have become the longest running and most successful band in rock and roll history.

programme.desc: Tom, a public speaking professor at a Kansas community college, encounters traditional Bible Belt values everywhere, including within his own family.

programme.desc: Scott and his wife Tracy were married for 11 years and had 3 kids. Now divorced, Scott's decided to finally tell his ex-wife who he is, whether she wants to hear it or not.

programme.title: Coming Out Stories

programme.title: Coming Out Stories
programme.desc: JP is very close to her traditional Korean mother. Now she feels it's time to conquer her fears and tell her mom who she really is, even if it means losing the bond they share.

programme.title: Coming Out Stories

programme.desc: Karlie and Mo's issues boil over at a dramatic therapy session. Shekinah uncovers a scandal at Joc's salon. Stevie leads Scrapp and the guys on an outdoor adventure. Rasheeda sets boundaries with Jasmine. Sierra has an angry run-in with BK.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Drama erupts at Kirk and Rasheeda's seminar. Ty questions Mimi's relationship with Stevie. The mothers of Joc's children weigh in on Kendra. Pooh and Akbar link up to take down Shekinah. Scrapp debates his next move with Sierra.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Kendra gets wind of the scandalous rumors about Joc. Insensitive comments spark an emotional argument between Spice and Shekinah. Tokyo goes missing. Scrapp struggles to break the cycle. Akbar finds common ground with an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Karlie and her daughter collide with Pooh and her daughter at Rasheeda's event. Joc digs himself a deeper hole with Kendra. Scrappy struggles after a disastrous family get-together. Tokyo opens up to her mom about her personal struggles.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Mimi and Faith get caught up in Stevie and Ty's beef. Joc plots a happy ending with Kendra. Scrappy comes to terms with his car accident. Pooh and Sierra collide at Spice and Akbar's session. Karlie arrives at a crossroads on her fertility journey.

programme.title: Bobbit It Off!
programme.desc: Kirk and Rasheeda's 20th anniversary party goes left when Alexis Skyy comes for Karlie. Sierra fights for her freedom. Joc is horrified when Kendra asks him to get snipped. Momma Dee is in a health crisis. Karlie has been keeping a shocking secret.

programme.title: No Witness, No Protection
programme.desc: There's trouble in paradise for besties Sierra and Karlie. Up and coming rap superstar LightSkinKeisha is on the scene with her man by her side. Karlie and Alexis bond over a shared enemy and Scrappy continues to fear for Momma Dee's life.

programme.title: Oh Deer
programme.desc: Former besties Karlie and Sierra are left reeling after their brawl. Bambi has it out for alleged homewrecker LightSkinKeisha. Stevie uncovers Mimi's deep seated abandonment issues. And Scrappy worries Momma Dee is drinking again.

programme.title: Queen of Atlanta
programme.desc: Akbar goes to war with LightSkinKeisha over her throne as queen of Atlanta. Scrappy and Bambi seek peace for their family, but their moms have other plans in mind. Newbie Kiyomi Leslie is on the scene. And Shooter juggles his messy love life.

programme.title: Slippery Slope
programme.desc: Rasheeda decides to whisk the girls away for a ski trip, but a family crisis gets in the way. Sierra and Shooter are also in crisis when their daughter is assaulted at school. Alexis opens up about her traumatic past. And a family feud turns nasty.

programme.title: You Trippin'
programme.desc: The ski trip gets off to a dramatic start as the ladies take pregnancy tests. Spice and Shekinah butt heads. All hell breaks loose as Shooter's messy love triangle implodes. Newlyweds Safaree and Erica witness Cheyenne and Ki'yomi coming face to face.

programme.title: Black Diamond
programme.desc: Karlie and Sierra have an emotional heart to heart on the ski trip. Shekinah and Spice's feud rages on. Shooter's messy love triangle goes up in flames after Cheyenne and Ki'yomi come face to face. Sierra catches BK cheating.

programme.title: The Kids Are Alright
programme.desc: Bambi breaks the news to Scrappy about baby number two, leaving Momma Dee feeling left out of the palace. Kirk and Rasheeda pick up the pieces when Kirk Jr is released from prison. And a vengeful BK turns the cheating rumors back on Sierra.

programme.title: Shut It Down
programme.desc: Coronavirus cases in Atlanta explode leaving everyone wondering how they'll make ends meet. All hell breaks loose when Akbar comes face to face with her many enemies at Spice's pop up shop.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil
programme.desc: A two-year-old Tasmanian Devil named Carlos looks for food and fights for dominance.

programme.title: Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge
programme.desc: The Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits dash to cash on July's salmon feast; BigBoi embarks on a food-finding road trip, QuadMom and RedBack are welcomed to the feast and BoldFace keeps her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge
programme.desc: Stage one of the competition kicks off with seven ravenous bears post-hibernation; tiny Stomper vies for power and Blondie's love, grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova and new mom BoldFace battles wolves.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart
programme.desc: Taking a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures, celebrating the Lone Star State's landscapes and wildlife, and looking at how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas' unique habitats.

programme.title: Big Cats
programme.desc: The lions of Tanzania are the only cat species to live in groups; tiny rusty spotted cat of Sri Lankais 200 times smaller than a lion but just as curious.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: The filmmakers shed light on the water worlds of Argentina and its diverse creatures, from anacondas to the great dusky swifts that rule the world's largest waterfall.

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away… and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Still searching for a route to the island in the sky, the Straw Hats chart a course for Jaya. Meanwhile, Fire-Fist Ace crashes a party aboard a vessel helmed by Buggy the Pirate!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats drop anchor at a town overrun by scallywags, so Nami makes the boys swear to stay out of trouble. But when the Bellamy Pirates come looking for a fight, Luffy may have to break his promise!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nico’s handy work unearths a solitary dreamer who may know the way to Sky Island. All Luffy and his crew have to do is survive the sonic onslaught of simian salvagers seeking to sink the Going Merry!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his mates reach the home of Mont Blanc Cricket: the man with the key to reaching Sky Island. There’s just one tiny problem – he comes from a long line of legendary liars.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Montblanc Cricket agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island, but first they must venture deep into the darkest depths of a spider-infested forest to capture a mysterious bird with a keen sense of direction.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the Straw Hats battle creepy-crawly forest creatures on their quest to capture a South Bird, Mont Blanc and his monkey minions are brutally attacked by the Bellamy Pirates!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy turned the other cheek during his first encounter with Bellamy, but now he’s out to settle the score for old man Mont Blanc. Meanwhile, a fearsome pirate crew takes aim at the Straw Hats, eager to earn a bad reputation!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Thanks to some modifications to the Going Merry, the Straw Hats are on their way to that island in the sky! But with the Blackbeard Pirates in hot pursuit, navigating the vertical currents will be anything but easy.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Reaching the sea of clouds proves easier than surviving in it when giant sea creatures attack the Going Merry, Usopp nearly drowns in a cloud, and a strange sky knight issues the Straw Hats a warning!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After hitching a ride on a speedy shrimp, the Straw Hats reach the land of Skypiea! The intrepid pirates have much to learn about their new surroundings, but a beautiful angel makes a perfect tour guide.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami’s eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heaven’s Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats are no strangers to living on the wrong side of the law, but unpaid immigration fees and Nami’s assault of a White Beret earns Luffy’s crew a sentence of death by cloud drifting!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami, Zoro, Chopper, and Robin are trapped aboard the Going Merry when it’s commandeered by a monstrous lobster! To rescue his crew, Luffy must venture onto the sacred grounds of Upper Yard!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Conis helps Luffy and his mates launch their rescue mission, but the rubber-man senses something amiss. When he presses her for answers, a vengeful god takes a shot at the Straw Hats!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp tangle with Satori and his exploding, snake-filled Surprise Clouds. The sky priest may look like a dancing dango, but the impact of his mantra leaves the pirates bloodied and boatless.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp and Sanji try to regain control of the Crow, and Luffy stirs up a brutal barrage of bursting balls when he attacks Satori. Meanwhile, Chopper whistles for the Sky Knight to avoid becoming a sacrificial reindeer!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper fights bravely to stop Shura from incinerating the Going Merry, but the little reindeer is no match for a sky priest. Gan Fall is on his way, but will the dispossessed deity arrive in time?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: When Gan Fall is badly burned during his battle with Shura, Chopper musters the courage for a death-defying leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy may have finally discovered a way to defeat Satori!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the Shandorians continue their battle for control of Upper Yard, the Straw Hats celebrate their happy reunion by swapping stories over a campfire and feasting on barbequed Skyshark!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Laki’s pursuit of precious Vearth causes one of her Shandorian comrades to be injured during the battle with Ohm. As night falls on Upper Yard, the Straw Hats dream of gold while dancing with wolves!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats scatter when their search for gold uncovers a giant python, and Gan Fall reveals the tragic story of Jaya’s arrival in the sky. Meanwhile, Wyper readies the Shandorians for a raid on Eneru’s shrine!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the heartless god of Upper Yard eagerly anticipates the dawning of Sky Warefare, the Shandorian forces are savagely snared by the Ordeal of String, and Luffy wanders into the fight of his life!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro rushes to perfect a deadly technique known as the Flying Blade Attack. The move proves difficult to master, but it could be the key to the swordsman surviving a battle with the Shandorian warrior, Braham.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji and Usopp are driven to their knees by the electrifying presence of god, Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wyper’s Burn Bazooka, and Nami joins Gan Fall in a fight against two killer clones!

programme.desc: The crew must stop a world shipbuilder before he launches another invasion.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Texas authorities have a killer riding the rails and leaving a literal trail of bread crumbs after eating at victims' tables; when more murders are linked, the FBI names a Most Wanted suspect and a national manhunt for The Railroad Killer ensues.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Minnesota police hunt for a killer caller who confesses to a string of murders in a chilling, high-pitched voice, begging for forgiveness; no one can identify him until one woman survives a brutal attack.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In the summer of 1976, the NYPD are chasing a man shooting at couples in parked cars with a gigantic, .44 caliber handgun; he taunts the city with terrifying letters until police get a lead about a suspect who has shot a neighbor's dog.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Brooklyn shop keepers are afraid of closing time as a killer shoots his victims while locking up their stores.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In the 1990's, New York is on edge as a killer leaves coded clues at crime scenes and declares his compulsion to choose victims by their birth signs.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A rash of young men goes missing around Chicago during the 1970s; when bodies start washing up in the river, a pattern emerges; a small piece of evidence leads police to the home of a model citizen, where his furnace puts the suspect in the hot seat.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Police find a string of murdered women in shallow graves in very remote areas of the Alaskan wilderness; after months of searching, police zero in on a local family man living a double life that no one suspects.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Numerous women are found dead by the side of the road with a unique ligature that looks like a dog collar and leash; detectives are stumped until a 17-year-old girl manages an escape from a vicious kidnapper, leading police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: The I-5 corridor in California is taken over by a brazen bandit who terrorizes the highway with a blitz of assaults and murders; the only clue to the killer's identity is a specific athletic tape used to bind his victims.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer taunts Wichita, Kan., for decades by sending brazen letters and taking credit for horrific kills; at the introduction of the computer era, the killer gets sloppy and accidentally leaves a digital clue.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In the 1990s, Louisiana is terrorized by multiple serial killers; the Zachary Police Department discovers the key to solving their cases when a pattern emerges with personal items missing from each local victim.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A killer is murdering and mutilating young women along the Route 40 corridor in Delaware, but after investigators set up an undercover operation, the hunter soon becomes the hunted.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: After multiple men are discovered brutally murdered, investigators determine that each victim was last seen with a handsome stranger they met in a bar.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: After a series of women in the Seattle area are found brutally murdered with their bodies posed, police realize that they might have a killer stalking the area nightclub scene who is able to charm his victims into submission.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Chicago police investigate the murders of several women, whose bodies are discovered in abandoned buildings barefoot.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.desc: A dog can be a dead man's best friend. Dogs have been trained to sniff out corpses, drugs, explosives, and missing persons. They're often the first to find the essential clue that sets an investigation in motion.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: These cases took a decade or more to solve. There's no statute of limitations on murder. As a case turns cold, the clues become scarce, investigators must rely on science to close cold cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Psychological Profiling: Journey into the dark recesses and calculated madness present only in our worst nightmares…and in the minds of serial killers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes killers are careful to leave no fingerprints behind. But methods of the murder itself can leave a lasting impression on police, especially when the tools (or weapons) of a killer's trade leave an innocent victim marked for death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Photography has long been a vital tool in homicide investigations. A single image captures enough information to identify a suspect, and to preserve a vital clue long after a witness' memory fades.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensics in the O.J. Simpson Murder Trial: Millions watched on television as the jury rendered their verdict. Orenthal James Simpson was found not guilty of murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A Chinese man and his son fight prejudice as they try to open a laundry in North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark takes a job as a stable boy against his father's wishes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Milly are held hostage in her general store when two gunmen attempt a daring robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas turns them down because they are escorting a murderer, to be hanged in Yuma.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark goes to work for Will Temple, a badly scarred, very mysterious rancher.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Corey Hazlett insists he's innocent of murder, despite Lucas's eyewitness testimony.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to dissuade a latter-day knight from rushing into battle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Abe Lincoln's claim that he's the Great Emancipator amuses everyone except Matt Yordy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Stubborn Grandpa Fogarty is Lucas's main roadblock as he tries to get young Woody Fogarty to attend school.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark Twain visits North Fork and quickly alienates the townspeople.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to stop embittered John Holliver from venting his wrath on the people who expelled him from town years before.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark is kidnapped and held for ransom, he finds himself an unwilling companion of gunman Carl Avery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas seeks an escape when he's captured by outlaws while seeking help for an injured Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The young Queen-to-be of France hides out in North Fork with her sick brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A notorious killer is being held in the North Fork jail. When word gets around that Gordo's gang is on its way to free him, the whole town becomes frightened.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark falls head-over-heels in puppy love.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Len Richards and his brother, Ab, confront a Lucas McCain look-alike, Earl Bantry and his sidekick K.C. Peters, for slaughtering one of Richards' steers.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Milly are shocked when Lucas begins gambling. They don't know that Lucas is "undercover" trying to catch a man cheating.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Actor Rance McGrew makes TV Westerns for a living, but he's a lousy actor and a worse cowboy. Despite that, each week he "wins" against the bad guys. Finally, the bad guys have had enough and decide to teach McGrew a lesson.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The senior residents of Sunnyvale decide that the secret to youth is acting young, and in particular playing a childhood game called "kick-the-can."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Fortune discovers that a piano he bought his wife for her birthday has magical properties - the music that it plays makes people reveal their true essence.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Jeff Myrtlebank comes back to life at his own funeral and soon begins to act very strangely...

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Kanamits, 9-foot tall aliens, arrive on Earth with one lofty goal: To Serve Man.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Awakened by the cries of their daughter Bettina, Chris and Ruth Miller enter her room to find that she has vanished - even though they still hear her crying for help. Chris' physicist friend Bill thinks she moved into another dimension.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Old Ben, who is able to transform himself into anything, tries to help a crippled little girl.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: David Gurney wakes up to find that no one - his wife, his co-workers, his best friend, not even his own mother knows him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An astronaut declares himself a god when his ship lands on a planet populated by people smaller than ants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A loud-mouthed braggart's boasts attract the attention of some aliens.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An elderly couple visit the New Life Corporation, hoping to transport their personalities into youthful artificial bodies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An alien who crash-lands into a remote mountain village stirs up the villagers' fears and animosity, but he befriends a little boy and gives him a mysterious present.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A ventriloquist is convinced that his dummy, Willie, is alive and evil. He makes plans for a new act with a new dummy: plans that Willie doesn't support!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a newlywed couple briefly returns to the groom's childhood home, the ties of the past prove too strong to resist.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A widower buys a robot grandmother for his three children.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Cavender, an angel trying to win his wings, tries to help down-on-her-luck Agnes, who has just been fired.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A scientist creates an android that has the qualities which he feels he's lacking.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A US naval destroyer investigates a mysterious tapping sound coming from a sunken submarine.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and his group make a risky run into Washington, D.C. to search for artifacts they will need to build the civilization he and Carl envisioned.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The communities join forces to restore a bridge that will facilitate communication and trade; someone is gravely injured at the construction site.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick's vision for the future is threatened by a mysterious disappearance that divides the work camp where the communities are building a bridge.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick's vision of a civilized future is threatened by a sudden reckoning with past sins that remain unavenged and unforgiven.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick is forced to face the past as he struggles to maintain the safety of the communities and protect the future he and Carl envisioned.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The survivors encounter unfamiliar faces outside the safety of their community's walls and must decide whether or not this new group can be trusted.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol seeks out an old friend living alone in a wilderness teeming with walkers; survivors make the perilous trek to a new home.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A small rescue mission braves a dangerous herd in their hunt for a missing comrade, only to discover a surprising threat that could doom them all.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de separarse de sus hijos, Maggie, Gabriel y Rosita siguen un convoy militar hasta un destino misterioso. Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan y Annie acaban en una zona de obras. Daryl y Carol siguen a un tren que lleva a Connie a bordo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Ezekiel y Negan organizan una revuelta clandestina contra los guardianes. Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se unen a Luke y a Jules durante su huida a la costa. Además, Eugene es juzgado con el apoyo de Yumiko como abogada defensora.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los alejandrinos y los prisioneros vuelven a la Commonwealth para enfrentarse a Pamela Milton. Por otro lado, una horda se acerca a la ciudad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol llevan a Judith al hospital, mientras que Rosita, Eugene y Gabriel buscan a Coco. Por otro lado, Maggie y Negan se enfrentan a Pamela y los héroes se reúnen para una última batalla.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick Grimes, policía de una pequeña localidad de Georgia, despierta de un coma y repentinamente se encuentra en un mundo apocalíptico. Desorientado, en busca de su familia y una explicación a lo acontecido, Rick ha de adaptarse al nuevo orden.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick llega a caballo a Atlanta, donde encuentra una ciudad desolada. Tras escapar de una situación de peligro, Rick se une a un grupo de supervivientes en unos grandes almacenes, donde le espera un enemigo más peligroso que los zombis.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick regresa a Atlanta al sentirse culpable de haber dejado a Merle abandonado en un edificio asolado por zombis. En el campamento, la inesperada llegada de Rick causa tensión entre Lori y Shane, quien había asegurado que Rick había muerto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En Atlanta, una banda armada sorprende al grupo de Rick mientras están buscando a Merle. Entretanto, en el campamento, Jim empieza a comportarse de forma extraña, tiene premoniciones y asusta a los niños con una tragedia que se aproxima.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras el ataque al campamento, Rick conduce al grupo hacia el CDC, un recinto de la base sanitaria militar, en el que esperan encontrar un refugio seguro. Durante el trayecto, Jim debe tomar una decisión extremadamente difícil.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Un científico inquietante deja entrar a Rick y su grupo en el CDC. No obstante, hay algo extraño y los supervivientes del apocalipsis zombi empiezan a sospechar que no todo es lo que parece en el recinto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo, liderado por Rick, se topa con una horda de zombis en mitad de la autopista. La pequeña Sophia, asustada, huye sola al bosque y todos tratarán de encontrarla antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick encuentra una granja en la que buscar ayuda para salvar la vida de su hijo, quien recibió el impacto accidental de una bala. Después, Shane entra en una escuela llena de zombis para llevarse material sanitario junto al tipo que disparó a Carl.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane y Otis están atrapados por los zombis en la escuela adonde acudieron por el material sanitario necesario para operar a Carl. En la granja, surgen las primeras tensiones y Daryl y Andrea vuelven a salir en busca de Sophie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane regresa a la granja con las medicinas, pero el sacrificio que he tenido que cometer no es bien visto por el resto del grupo. En la granja, el grupo intenta sacar a un zombi del pozo de agua fresca antes de que la infecte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras busca a Sophia, Daryl sufre un accidente que lo deja perdido y herido en el bosque. La tensión entre el grupo y los propietarios de la granja aumenta, así como la inestabilidad del propio grupo, debido a que Shane desafía a Rick.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon try to stop a territorial governor who runs his domain with dictatorial power.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A villainous art collector masterminds a plot to turn agent James West against the Secret Service.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon battle an assortment of characters to extradite a Bosnian Nobleman back to his homeland to face trial.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West

programme.desc: An over-ambitious general plans to rise to the presidency of the U.S. because of his reputation as a ruthless Indian fighter.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents West and Gordon work to avert the destruction of the American Cotton industry.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West

programme.title: The Wild Wild West

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom shows a homeowner how to replace a leaking skylight. The guys ask "What is it?" Electrician Peg Preble shows Kevin how to troubleshoot and repair a faulty 3-way light switch.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Roger helps a homeowner improve her lawn, starting with a simple soil test. The guys ask "What is it?" Richard and Kevin visit a home center to identify several different types of water supply pipes.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard helps a pair of Arizona homeowners install a new water softening system. Tom Silva shows a homeowner how to install fiber-cement shingles on his new backyard shed.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom shows how to save energy and money by increasing attic insulation. Roger makes a walkway safer by adding low-voltage landscape lighting. Richard replaces a homeowner’s old kitchen faucet.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard shows kids how to build a soccer goal using PVC pipes. Tom demonstrates how to build a pair of stilts. Roger shows a family how to build a sandbox and make replicas of fossils.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom installs an old mortised lockset on a new door. Richard helps a homeowner install a pellet stove Roger shows Kevin several different types of lawn mowers which do not require gasoline.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Roger replaces a set of rotten wooden stairs with granite. Kevin O'Connor shows the latest technology for deadbolt locks. Richard helps a homeowner replace leaky polybutylene pipes in his house.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Roger shows how to improve a lawn with a “slice seeder.” Richard and Tom share how to drive a nail in a tight spot. Kevin gives tips on preparing a home for sale. Richard fixes a ceiling water leak.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: This special episode is dedicated to the life and work of tile expert Joe Ferrante. Joe worked on many projects for This Old House and Ask This Old House over 20 years.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard installs a "pressure reducing valve." Roger discusses which types of grass are best for climates and conditions. The guys ask "What is it?" Tom installs crown molding on kitchen cabinets.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard shows how to replace the parts inside a toilet tank. Roger shares tips on above-ground sprinklers and lawn watering. Tom shows how to build a plywood bookcase using portable power tools.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Ask This Old House kicks off its 7th season on PBS. Tom Silva prevents a garage roof from collapsing, the guys ask, "What is it?" and Roger helps two homeowners dry out their basement.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Roger shows how to transplant a large, mature tree, the guys ask, "What is it?" then, Richard helps two homeowners sleep better at night by quieting their noisy heating system.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Nashville, Tennessee, where he helps brighten up a kitchen with new pendant lighting. Then, houseplant expert Carrie Kelly shows Roger how to care for cacti and other succulents.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Roger helps repair damage done to a lawn when a new well was installed. The guys ask "What is it?" and Tom shows a homeowner how to make curved stair molding with red oak and simple power tools.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Roger transplants a giant Rhododendron bush. The guys ask, "What is it?" and then, Richard helps a homeowner increase water pressure with an electric water-pressure booster.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom shows Kevin how to repair damaged laminate countertops. Roger rebuilds a brick walkway. The guys ask, "What is it?" and then Richard shows different types of filters for forced-air HVAC systems.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom seals openings around doors, windows, and penetrations into a house. Richard reduces heating costs by installing a weather-responsive boiler control. Tom cools things with a whole-house fan.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom prepares a shower enclosure for tile using a new type of waterproofing system, the guys ask "What is it?" and Roger helps install a privacy screen using bushes and a decorative flower garden.

programme.title: Ask This Old House

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Fernado Vargas

programme.title: Oscar Valdez vs Scott Quigg

programme.title: Randall Bailey vs Mike Jones

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Victorious: Beck's Big Break
programme.desc: Tori accidentally gets Beck fired from a small role in a movie, then must figure out a way to get him his job back. Meanwhile, Robbie suffers frightening nightmares about his best friend Rex.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori the Zombie
programme.desc: Tori gets the lead in a high profile school musical, but freaks out when a stage makeup project goes awry, and she's left looking like a zombie on opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Jade Dumps Beck
programme.desc: After a jealous Jade dumps Beck, she soon regrets it and recruits Tori to help get him back. Meanwhile, Trina puts on a one-woman show and tells Robbie he better give it a good review… or else!

programme.title: Victorious: The Birthweek Song
programme.desc: Tori struggles to find the perfect birthday gift for Trina, then decides to write her sister a song as a present. An ungrateful Trina turns the song into cash by selling it, enraging Tori.

programme.title: Victorious: Robarazzi
programme.desc: Tori suggests Robbie capture videos of students' everyday lives to increase his blog traffic, but when the camera is turned on Tori, she asks him to stop. Only Robbie doesn't and Tori realizes she's created a monster.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie defeat a famous TV chef in a cooking challenge, the chef gives up cooking, quits his show, and refuses to come out of his bedroom. Spencer tries to make his vision of the future a reality.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie accidentally get Principal Franklin fired, Miss Briggs and Mr. Howard take control and enforce harsh rules. Meanwhile, Spencer hires a grizzled old rodeo star to teach him to ride a mechanical bull.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam announces a "take Carly to the dance contest" for an upcoming Girls' Choice dance, so many boys show up that Carly, Sam, and Freddie have to hold a speed-dating session to meet them all.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie agree to make a music video for a pop star who's trying to make a comeback, they discover that she is out of shape and untalented. Spencer has trouble dating a woman when he discovers she's Gibby's mom.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Freddie saves Carly's life, Carly falls in love with him. Meanwhile, Sam and Spencer compete against each other in a paintball game called Assassin.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Gibby discovers Freddie and his girlfriend in a compromising position, he vows revenge and challenges Freddie to a fight. Meanwhile, Spencer's art career really takes off when the local paper incorrectly reports his death.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When the gang discovers that Lewbert was once a happy man engaged to a beautiful woman, they set out to reunite the lost lovers. Spencer joins the building watch to catch a thief that's been stealing from the apartments.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Sam reveals to Carly and Freddie that she used to compete in pageants as a young girl. When she learns that her long-time rival will be competing in Seattle, she convinces Carly to compete against her.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam ends up in jail, Carly and Freddie vow that the web show must go on. They try to enlist Spencer's help at that last minute but he has a date he can't cancel.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: An eccentric billionaire asks the iCarly gang to perform the first live web show from outer space. They go through a series of tests to make sure they're fit for space travel. Back at the loft, Spencer is visited by a mysterious little girl.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Bigfoot fever hits Seattle when hikers take some fuzzy footage of a suspicious figure in the woods. After an expert validates the footage on the web show, Carly convinces the gang to go upstate and join the search for Bigfoot.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Fed up with his Mom constantly treating him like a baby, Freddie decides to move out into his own place. The gang starts a successful pet photography business. They end up in a feud with a rival pet photo studio.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When a heatwave hits Seattle and the power goes out, Spencer comes to the rescue with a Norwegian air conditioner.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: The Cast introduces bloopers and outtakes from the series.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Spencer tries to surprise Carly for her birthday and ends up burning down her bedroom instead. But when the insurance company hands him a big check, he has a chance to make it up to her.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: After an iCarly fan proposes to his girlfriend live on the web show, the gang gets roped into going to the wedding. But when the bride gets cold feet, Carly must come to the rescue.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: The gang goes into business making and selling Penny-Tees. After sales go through the roof, Sam recruits 4th-graders to help make shirts. But Carly, Sam, & Freddie disagree about how to treat them.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Ridiculed for never pulling a prank, Carly recruits Spencer's help to prank Sam and Freddie. But after Spencer gets a taste for it, he can't stop pranking. The gang must figure out how to stop him.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: After fighting with her mom, Sam moves in with Carly, who soon realizes she's a horrible guest. Freddie is stalked by a dangerous criminal after catching him on video committing a crime.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When a video of Nevel yelling at a little girl surfaces on the internet, Nevel becomes hated by everyone. After celebrating Nevel's demise, the iCarly gang then works to restore his honor after Nevel begs them for help.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: The gang decides to hire an intern for the web series. Carly and Sam hire a guy they think is cute, but the new intern proves to be more trouble than he's worth. Freddy has to prove to Carly and Sam that they're better off without him.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat are tasked with getting a child to give up her ratty, old stuffed animal.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam gets a job as the assistant to rapper, Peezy B; Cat finds babysitting much more challenging without Sam around to help.
